attributes.action: Force Broadcasters to Upgrade All "Relay Transmitters" So Everybody Gets The Same Digital Service.
attributes.additional_details: We request the Government to put pressure on those broadcasters that have decided not to spend money on upgrading the Relay Transmitters to do so, thus enabling every household in the U.K. to receive the full range of digital television channels through their existing aerials instead of having to subscribe to Sky or pay for Freesat. If that is not possible please oblige them to make it very clear to householders that they might not receive the full service they are currently being promised.
